alert.note: Alert for Bedford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 5:00PM EDT until July 23 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bedford County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 459 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bedford, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bedford, Breezewood, Everett, Cessna, Saxton, Defiance and Hopewell. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 70 near mile marker 147. The Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 142 and 159, and near mile marker 165. Interstate 99 from mile markers 0 to 1. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
